meanings.definition: A branch office or department of a larger organization.
meanings.sent1: The subbureaus of the company handle specific tasks.
meanings.sent2: The subbureaus report to the main headquarters.
meanings.sent3: The subbureaus had a party to celebrate their successful projects.
meanings.sent4: The subbureaus are like the arms of a big corporate body.
meanings.sent5: Navigating through the subbureaus can be confusing for new employees.

meanings.sent1: She visited the subbureaus to discuss the budget.
meanings.sent2: The subbureaus assist in managing daily operations.
meanings.sent3: The subbureaus play a crucial role in supporting the main office.
meanings.sent4: The subbureaus act as the right-hand of the central bureau.
meanings.sent5: Efficient communication between the subbureaus is essential for smooth functioning.
